contents:
...不好意思乱入问一下...蓬佩奥西点军校毕业是以全班第一名还是1986届第一名？抱歉我英文不好这...

是當屆第一。

佐證：

Pompeo received the second biggest ovation of the day during graduation ceremonies for the class of 1986...the largest ovation at Wednesday’s commencement went, as is tradition, to the “class goat,” the cadet who finished last.

來源：

https://www.latimes.com/archives/la-xpm-1986-05-31-me-8260-story.html

似乎英美大學慣常不分班，大陸大學慣常分班。
